mapper.insert: INSERT INTO raceHorse ( raceId, horseId, jockeyId, frameNumber, weight, old ) SELECT #{race.id}, id as horseId, ( SELECT id as jockeyId FROM jockey WHERE name = #{raceHorse.jockey.name} ) as jockeyId, #{raceHorse.frameNumber}, #{raceHorse.weight}, #{raceHorse.old} FROM horse WHERE name = #{raceHorse.horse.name}
